entries.purpose: Aligned. Seeks to defeat or destroy those of a diametrically opposed alignment; never Neutral.
Bane. Seeks to thwart or destroy creatures of a particular type, such as Constructs, Fiends, or Undead.
Creator Seeker. Seeks its creator and wants to understand why it was created.
Destiny Seeker. Believes it and its bearer have key roles to play in future events.
Destroyer. Craves destruction and goads its user to fight arbitrarily.
Glory Seeker. Seeks renown as the greatest magic item by winning fame or notoriety for its user.
Lore Seeker. Craves knowledge or seeks to solve a mystery, learn a secret, or unravel a cryptic prophecy.
Protector. Seeks to defend a particular kind of creature, such as elves or werewolves.
Soulmate Seeker. Seeks another sentient magic item, perhaps one similar to itself.
Templar. Seeks to defend the servants and interests of a particular deity.
